sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect, useMemo, useCallback } from 'react'; import { Card, Row, Col, ListGroup, Badge, Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import AuthContext from '../../context/AuthContext'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { currentUser, getAllUsers } = useContext(AuthContext); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); // Sample stats - memoized to prevent recreation on rerender const stats = useMemo(() => ({ totalUsers: 24, activeUsers: 18, newUsers: 3, totalClients: 15, totalMechanics: 5, totalAdmins: 4 }), []); // Sample system logs - memoized to prevent recreation on rerender const systemLogs = useMemo(() => [ { id: 1, action: 'User Login', user: 'john.doe@example.com', timestamp: '2023-06-15 08:23:45', status: 'Success' }, { id: 2, action: 'Password Reset', user: 'jane.smith@example.com', timestamp: '2023-06-15 09:45:12', status: 'Success' }, { id: 3, action: 'Role Change', user: 'mike.johnson@example.com', timestamp: '2023-06-15 10:12:34', status: 'Success' }, { id: 4, action: 'Failed Login', user: 'unknown@example.com', timestamp: '2023-06-15 11:05:22', status: 'Failed' }, { id: 5, action: 'User Registration', user: 'sarah.williams@example.com', timestamp: '2023-06-15 14:18:47', status: 'Success' } ], []); // Fetch users on component mount useEffect(() => { let isMounted = true; const fetchUsers = async () => { try { setLoading(true); console.log('AdminDashboard: Fetching users...'); const userData = await getAllUsers(); // Only update state if component is still mounted if (isMounted) { setUsers(userData || []); setError(null); console.log('AdminDashboard: Successfully loaded users'); } } catch (err) { console.error('AdminDashboard: Error fetching users:', err); if (isMounted) { setError('Failed to fetch users'); } } finally { if (isMounted) { setLoading(false); } } }; fetchUsers(); // Cleanup function to prevent state updates after unmount return () => { isMounted = false; }; }, [getAllUsers]); // Render role badges with memoization const renderRoleBadges = useCallback((userRoles) => { return userRoles?.map((role) => ( {role} )); }, []); return (

Admin Dashboard

Role-Based Access: This page is only accessible to users with the "admin" role.

ID Action User Timestamp Status
{log.id} {log.action} {log.user} {log.timestamp} {log.status}
Recent Users

Loading...

) : error ? (

) : users.length === 0 ? (
No users found.
) : ( {users.slice(0, 5).map((user) => ( ))}
Name Email Roles Status Actions
{user.firstName} {user.lastName} {user.email} {renderRoleBadges(user.roles)} {user.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'} Manage
)}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
